Emergency FAQ

Are you actually a nonprofit?

Yes. We are a registered 501(c)(3): Felines Against Financial Delusion. We accept grants, tuna, and dramatic confessions.

Will you read my full receipt out loud?

Only if it exceeds 7 feet and includes the phrase "artisanal battery organizer." Then yes, with theatrical pause.

Do cats have accounting credentials?

Four of ours passed the CPA exam by sleeping on the answer key. Legally complex. Spiritually valid.
